description: During final inspection of batch LOT-2025-0012, dimensional check on MACHINE_01 (CNC lathe) revealed outer diameter 12.52mm vs spec 12.00±0.05mm. Operator JEAN_D reported tool wear not flagged by system. Supplier STEELCO raw material within spec. 47 parts affected.
containment: Segregated all parts from LOT-2025-0012 in quarantine area. Halted production on MACHINE_01.
root_cause: Tool wear sensor calibration drift on MACHINE_01. Last calibration 45 days overdue.
corrective_action: Recalibrate tool wear sensors. Implement weekly calibration check.

description: Surface finish defect observed during visual inspection at ASSEMBLY_LINE_02. Scratches on 12 units from batch LOT-2025-0018. Process step: final polishing. Operator MARIE_L noted polishing pad worn beyond limit. Parts from supplier METALWORKS.
containment: Isolated affected units for rework assessment.
root_cause: Polishing pad exceeded service life. No replacement alert triggered.
corrective_action: Replace polishing pads. Add usage counter alert at 80% service life.

description: Customer complaint: Product P-4521 failed in field after 3 weeks. Weld joint fracture at connection point. Batch LOT-2024-0892 processed on WELDER_03. Operator PIERRE_M. Supplier ALLOYTECH provided filler material. 230 units potentially affected in field.
containment: Initiated customer notification. Recalled remaining stock from distributors.
root_cause: Filler wire from ALLOYTECH batch FW-2024-11 had incorrect alloy composition (lab analysis confirmed).
corrective_action: Issue SCAR to ALLOYTECH. Implement incoming inspection for filler material composition.

description: Heat treatment process deviation on FURNACE_01. Temperature log showed 15°C undershoot during soak phase for batch LOT-2025-0021. Hardness test results: 52 HRC vs spec 58-62 HRC. Operator LUCAS_R. 89 parts affected.
containment: Parts held in heat treatment quarantine pending disposition.
root_cause: Thermocouple T3 in FURNACE_01 showing drift. Preventive maintenance delayed.
corrective_action: Replace thermocouple T3. Re-heat treat batch. Update PM schedule enforcement.

description: Packaging damage found during shipping preparation. 8 units from batch LOT-2025-0025 had dented protective cases. Process step: packaging at PACK_STATION_01. Operator SOPHIE_B. Cases supplied by BOXPRO.
containment: Units set aside for repackaging inspection.
root_cause: Forklift impact on pallet during transfer. Operator training gap identified.
corrective_action: Retrain forklift operators. Add buffer zone marking in packaging area.

description: Incoming inspection rejection: Raw material batch RM-2025-0033 from supplier METALWORKS failed tensile strength test (485 MPa vs spec 520 MPa min). Material intended for critical components.
containment: Material quarantined. Production order PO-2025-102 on hold.
root_cause: Supplier process variation. Certificate of conformance did not match actual test results.
corrective_action: Issue SCAR to METALWORKS. Increase incoming inspection sampling rate.

description: Labeling error on 24 units from batch LOT-2025-0029. Wrong revision number printed (Rev B instead of Rev C). Discovered at LABELING_STATION_02 by operator MARC_T during final check.
containment: Units segregated for relabeling.
root_cause: Label template not updated after engineering change order ECO-2025-003.
corrective_action: Update label template. Add ECO verification step to label change process.

description: Leak test failure at TEST_BENCH_01. 15 units from batch LOT-2025-0031 showed pressure decay >5% (spec: <2%). Process step: hydraulic assembly. Operator ANNE_F. O-rings from supplier SEALTECH.
containment: Failed units quarantined. O-ring lot OR-2025-008 isolated.
root_cause: O-ring durometer out of spec (65 Shore A vs 70±2). SEALTECH batch variation.
corrective_action: SCAR to SEALTECH. Implement durometer check at incoming inspection.

description: MACHINE_01 produced 156 parts with thread depth 0.3mm short of spec before detection. Batch LOT-2025-0034. Operator JEAN_D. In-process inspection missed due to shift handover gap. Parts for customer AEROTECH order.
containment: All 156 parts quarantined. Customer notified of potential delay.
root_cause: Threading tool breakage not detected. Shift handover checklist not completed.
corrective_action: Implement mandatory tool check at shift change. Add in-process thread gauge check.

description: Cosmetic defect: Paint adhesion failure on 6 units from batch LOT-2025-0038. Process step: coating at PAINT_BOOTH_02. Operator CLAIRE_V. Paint from supplier COATPRO batch CP-2025-02.
containment: Units held for strip and repaint assessment.
root_cause: Surface preparation incomplete. Solvent wipe step skipped per operator statement.
corrective_action: Reinforce surface prep procedure. Add verification checkbox to work order.

description: Electrical test failure at TEST_BENCH_02. 9 units from batch LOT-2025-0040 showed insulation resistance <100MΩ (spec: >500MΩ). Assembly step: wire harness installation. Operator DAVID_P. Wire from CABLETECH.
containment: Units quarantined. Wire lot CW-2025-015 isolated for testing.
root_cause: Wire insulation damage during routing. Sharp edge on bracket not deburred.
corrective_action: Deburr bracket edges. Add insulation check to assembly instruction.

description: Documentation error: 3 Device History Records for batch LOT-2025-0042 missing operator signature at process step verification. Discovered during batch record review by QA.
containment: Batch on hold pending documentation completion.
root_cause: Operator THOMAS_G forgot to sign. No systemic issue identified.
corrective_action: Remind operators of signature requirements. Consider electronic signature system.

description: Dimensional nonconformance on MACHINE_03 (milling center). Slot width 8.12mm vs spec 8.00±0.05mm on 34 parts from batch LOT-2025-0044. Operator MARIE_L. Similar issue occurred on MACHINE_03 in December 2024.
containment: Parts quarantined. MACHINE_03 taken offline for investigation.
root_cause: Spindle bearing wear causing runout. Recurring issue - PM interval insufficient.
corrective_action: Replace spindle bearings. Reduce PM interval from 6 months to 3 months for MACHINE_03.

description: Assembly error: 5 units shipped to customer MEDITECH with wrong PCB revision installed (Rev 2.1 instead of Rev 2.3). Customer reported malfunction. ASSEMBLY_LINE_01 operator LUCAS_R.
containment: Customer return initiated. Remaining Rev 2.1 boards quarantined.
root_cause: Obsolete PCB boards not removed from line stock. Inventory control failure.
corrective_action: Purge obsolete inventory. Implement barcode verification at assembly.

description: Surface contamination (oil residue) detected on 18 parts from batch LOT-2025-0048 during cleanliness inspection. Process step: machining on MACHINE_02. Operator PIERRE_M. Coolant from supplier LUBRITECH.
containment: Parts sent for additional cleaning cycle.
root_cause: Coolant concentration too high (12% vs spec 8-10%). Mix ratio error.
corrective_action: Recalibrate coolant mixer. Implement daily concentration checks.

description: Weld porosity detected via X-ray inspection on WELDER_03. 7 units from batch LOT-2025-0050 exceed porosity limits. Operator ANNE_F. Shielding gas from GASTECH. Second porosity issue on WELDER_03 this month.
containment: Units quarantined. WELDER_03 offline pending investigation.
root_cause: Gas flow regulator malfunction. Insufficient shielding during weld.
corrective_action: Replace regulator. Add pre-weld gas flow verification step.

description: Weight variation detected at PACK_STATION_01. 4 units from batch LOT-2025-0052 underweight by 15g (spec: 500g±5g). Operator SOPHIE_B. Component from supplier PARTCO.
containment: Units segregated for component verification.
root_cause: Missing washer in assembly. Component kit from PARTCO incomplete.
corrective_action: SCAR to PARTCO. Add weight check to assembly verification.

description: MACHINE_01 spindle crash during operation. Operator JEAN_D emergency stopped. Tool holder damaged, part LOT-2025-0055-001 scrapped. No injury. Third incident on MACHINE_01 in Q1.
containment: MACHINE_01 locked out. Maintenance called.
root_cause: G-code error in new program revision. Simulation not performed before production run.
corrective_action: Mandate program simulation before first article. Review all recent program changes.

description: Sterility test failure on batch LOT-2025-0056. Bioburden >10 CFU vs spec 0 CFU. Process step: final packaging in CLEANROOM_01. Operator CLAIRE_V. Packaging material from STERILEPACK.
containment: Entire batch quarantined. Cleanroom shutdown for investigation.
root_cause: HEPA filter bypass detected. Seal degradation on filter housing.
corrective_action: Replace HEPA filter and housing seal. Increase filter integrity test frequency.

description: Traceability gap: 12 units from batch LOT-2025-0058 missing serial number etching. Process step: marking at LASER_MARK_01. Operator MARC_T. Discovered during final inspection.
containment: Units held for marking completion.
root_cause: Laser marker ran out of marking solution mid-batch. No low-level alert.
corrective_action: Add solution level sensor. Implement batch start verification check.
